title: Abbott v. LULAC and Trump v. Anderson
description: Both cases attempted to hijack the Fourteenth Amendment to help one political party.
content: In the moment, it is very difficult to know what Supreme Court decisions are actually important. Perhaps Trump v. Anderson is a leading example. For nearly a year, the scholarly community completely … [+5498 chars]
